name: Barust, the Machine God of Conflagration
text:
Continuous: ATK and DEF of this card is equal to [total number of card in all magic stone areas x 100].
Enter: Destroy all resonators in your field, then destroy all resonators and J-ruler with 800 or more ATK in your opponent's field.
Activate. Banish a card in your magic stone area: This card deals 100 damage to target resonator or J-ruler.
